text:
COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
Proposed Resolution 20-980 (Deemed Approved November 8, 2014)

20 DCSTAT 4722

A PROPOSED RESOLUTION

Officially Read
September 23,
2014

To confirm the reappointment of Dr. Stuart B. Sibel to the Board of Podiatry.

RESOLVED, BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this
resolution may be cited as the "Board of Podiatry Stuart B. Sibel Confirmation Resolution of
2014".
Sec. 2. The Council of the District of Columbia confirms the reappointment of:
Stuart B. Sibel
1245 4 Street, S.W. #E-501
Washington, D.C. 20024
(Ward 6)
th

as a licensed podiatrist member of the Board of Podiatry, in accordance with section 2(f) of the
Confirmation Act of 1978, effective March 3, 1979 (D.C. Law 2-142; D.C. Official Code § 1523.01(t)), and pursuant to section 210 of the District of Columbia Health Occupations Revision
Act of 1985, effective March 25, 1986 (D.C. Law 6-99; D.C. Official Code § 3-1202.10), for a
term to end April 16, 2017.
Sec. 3. The Council of the District of Columbia shall transmit a copy of this resolution,
upon its adoption, each to the nominee and to the Office of the Mayor.
Sec. 4. This resolution shall take effect immediately.

Board of
Podiatry
Stuart B. Sibel
Confirmation
Resolution of
2014
